lines.text: I sense a - a yearning in you - a - a searching - almost - as if you're lost. You've been lost for a long, long time. Am I right?... You found Jesus, Al.
Why? Is he missing?
I can't believe it. I've been looking all over for this place. I don't know why, really. I spent a couple of days there when I was a kid, and, and I just remember having a really good time.
Me, too. My brother and I drowned a cat there once.
Is that right?
You used to be a cheerleader, didn't you?
Yeah, in the fourth fuckin' grade.
And your hair's not really blonde, is it?
Yes, it is.
No it's not, her hair's red, she's a redhead, she's got a bright red bush.

[At the swimming hole]
We're only wearing suits because you're here. Usually we go naked.
So do we.
Well, why don't we all take our suits off, then?
Look, peckerhead, I ain't losin' the goddamned suit.

[after Al tells him that professional wrestling is fake]
Uh, Al, I know you must be smart because you have a scientific-style job, but if this shit is fake and everyone knows it's fake, why the hell would anybody waste their time watching it?

[after Al fix his car]
Look at that! You're a goddamn wizard, Al!
[repeated line]
What's seven times twelve?
55 AM
32 PM.
05 PM.
My name's Floatie, not Flighty.
Hey, don't open that!
Why not?
You'll let the moonlight out, man. Come on, use your head!
Well, it's kind of hard to say this, but I've, uh, started seeing things.
Oh? What kind of things?
Well, I'm seeing things moving... backwards.
